attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a vehicle is imported into this country all previous keepers to be kept on the new V5 issued by DVLA, this has caused a lot of problems for car buyers in this country, as these cars are sold as (1) owner and fraud is being carried out by garages, also ex hire vehicles to have a different colour V5 as these are being touted as (1) owner as well

rejection.details: The title of the petition should be a call for action, not simply your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
